articles.title: Je suis Salman - spiked - Spiked
articles.description: Knife is a defiant defence of freedom in the face of Islamist terror.
articles.content:

Its a ‘miracle’, to use Salman Rushdie’s preferred phrase, that his splendid new book, Knife: Meditations After an Attempted Murder, exists at… [+9757 chars]
